product_overview: SpotCheck is a mobile application that leverages AI and OCR technology to help users efficiently manage their bills, contracts, and subscriptions by scanning documents, analyzing expenses, and providing personalized financial advice via an AI assistant.
core_goals: Enable seamless user authentication via email, Apple Sign In, and Google Sign In to ensure secure access.
Provide accurate on-device OCR document scanning and AI-powered analysis of bills and contracts.
Offer comprehensive CRUD operations to manage financial items with filtering and search capabilities.
Deliver personalized financial coaching through AI-driven chat functionality based on user's expense data.
Implement a freemium subscription model with premium features accessible via RevenueCat integration.
Display a user-friendly dashboard summarizing financial data with quick actions.
Support user preferences and profile management in settings.
Integrate renewal reminders with calendar events for important expiry dates.
Ensure a responsive and reliable user experience with network status monitoring and offline support.
Incorporate sensory feedback such as haptics and audio cues to enhance user interaction.
key_features: User Authentication supporting Email, Apple, and Google sign-ins via Supabase.
On-device OCR scanning combined with AI document analysis to extract and interpret information from bills and contracts.
Full CRUD capabilities for managing bills, contracts, and subscriptions, including search and filter functionalities.
AI-powered Chat Coach named Spot that offers financial advice derived from the user's expense list.
Freemium paywall system managing Pro subscription status using RevenueCat.
Dashboard providing an overview of financial summaries and actionable shortcuts.
Settings section for user profile, preferences, and app configuration management.
Calendar integration to create reminders and events for subscription renewals and contract expirations.
Network monitoring to detect connectivity and support offline usage seamlessly.
Reusable UI components including icons, buttons, toasts, and error boundaries with proactive sensory feedback features.
user_flow_summary: User signs up or logs in using email, Apple, or Google authentication methods.
User scans a document (bill or contract) using the app’s camera, triggering OCR and AI analysis to extract key details.
User views and manages scanned items with options to create, read, update, or delete bills, contracts, and subscriptions.
User interacts with Spot, the AI Chat Coach, to receive personalized financial advice based on analyzed expenses.
User upgrades to Pro subscription via an in-app paywall managed through RevenueCat to unlock additional features.
User accesses the dashboard to review financial summaries and quick access actions.
User sets preferences and updates profile information within the settings area.
User receives and manages renewal reminders integrated with their calendar for timely notifications on expiring items.
User experiences smooth app functionality with offline mode support and receives haptic and audio feedback during interactions.
validation_criteria: Authentication must support email, Apple Sign In, and Google Sign In correctly and securely.
OCR scanning accuracy should meet defined thresholds for text extraction from bills and contracts.
CRUD operations for bills, contracts, and subscriptions must perform reliably with proper data persistence and UI updates.
AI Chat Coach responses should be relevant and accurate based on the user’s expense data.
Subscription paywall must correctly restrict feature access and handle payments via RevenueCat.
Dashboard correctly aggregates and displays financial data with no errors.
User preferences and profile updates are saved and reflected within the app.
Renewal reminders must correctly sync with the device calendar and trigger notifications.
App must respond to network changes gracefully and provide a robust offline experience.
Sensory feedback triggers correspond appropriately with user actions and contribute positively to UX.
